#api_token.title: Admin password
#api_token.description: Admin password of your Shopify private app.

shop.title: Shop name
shop.description: Your shop id found in url, e.g. [shop_id].myshopify.com

date_since.title: Period from date [including].
date_since.description: Date in YYYY-MM-DD format or dateparser string i.e. 5 days ago, 1 month ago, yesterday, etc. If left empty, all records are downloaded.

date_to.title: Period to date [excluding].
date_to.description: Date in YYYY-MM-DD format or dateparser string i.e. 5 days ago, 1 month ago, yesterday, etc. If left empty, all records are downloaded.
